title: Verstappen skewers McLaren with '15 qualifying laps' to win Belgian GP sprint
summary: A storming drive by Max Verstappen, combined with a Red Bull with an ideal set-up, left McLaren on the back foot in the 2025 Belgian Grand Prix sprint race

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the sprint race at the 2025 Belgian Grand Prix?
Which team did Max Verstappen drive for during the 2025 Belgian Grand Prix sprint?
What was a key factor in Verstappen's performance during the sprint race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: An ideal set-up of the car
